subject: Your ATM card is ready now you
body:
Your ATM card is ready now you will received it by next week
 you should understand that you will pay
for the activation of the card
 as soon as you received the package from FedEx company
reconfirm your information to avoid any mistake on the Delivery
 Mr. Peter Iwu .

subject: Re: Your ATM card is ready now you
body:
Hello Mr. Peter Iwu,

Thank you for your message. It's great to hear that my ATM card is ready! I'm looking forward to receiving it next week.

I understand there might be a fee for the activation of the card, could you please provide more details about this? How much is the activation fee and how should it be paid?

Also, could you clarify what information you need me to reconfirm for the delivery? I want to make sure everything goes smoothly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Curtis

subject: Re: Your ATM card is ready now you

body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I'm really interested in learning more about what you have to share. Could you please provide some more details?

Best wishes,
Curtis
